extendedInfo.description: Just saying the statement, and let the truth be known!Is she lying to you again? He will not believe you? Well, prove it to him with a Polygraph test! Find out the truth with the Polygraph test!This is a great application of the party. A lot of fun just waiting to be had!This application can not tell right from wrong, but your friends will not know that! Get a random "True" or "False" with each statement.This is the Russian version, the German version is "Polygraph II". There is also an English version called "Lie Detector II"!For entertainment purposes only!

reviews.title: good
